snippet: Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, one of the Obama administration’s staunchest allies in Congress, said Thursday that he would oppose the president’s nomination of Michael P. Boggs to the federal bench in Georgia, dealing a fatal blow to the chances...
abstract: Sen Harry Reid of Nevada, one of Obama administration’s staunchest allies in Congress, says will oppose the president’s nomination of Michael P Boggs to the federal bench in Georgia, dealing a fatal blow to the chances of his confirmation.
lead_paragraph: Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, one of the Obama administration’s staunchest allies in Congress, said Thursday that he would oppose the president’s nomination of Michael P. Boggs to the federal bench in Georgia, dealing a fatal blow to the chances of his confirmation.

headline.main: Reid to Oppose Obama Nominee for Federal Court in Georgia
headline.print_headline: Reid to Oppose Obama Nominee for Federal Court in Georgia
